deployAppsVue.title: How to deploy your Vue App into GithubPages
deployAppsVue.p1: Do you want to deploy your Vue App into the internet and don't know how? You can follow the next steps in order to deploy it into GitHub Pages:
deployAppsVue.p2: • First of all, it’s necessary to change to a different branch from master that will be used to work on it.
deployAppsVue.p3: The reason of this is that the folder /dist will be uploaded to master when the application is deployed. The code that will be uploaded here is the /dist folder content.
deployAppsVue.p4-1: • The next step, is create a
deployAppsVue.p6: The script will create the application build and upload it to master.
deployAppsVue.p7-2: to execute the script that was previously created. Once it is finished, the deployed application will be available in the GitHub Pages url.
